channel.title: Client Background Request
channel.description:
Hey, Need a background for my client please, So if anyone could make me one I would be very very grateful.
Size: 765 x 503 Background: Could you just put pictures of pking and vengeance and inventories etc plz? Text: At the top could you put RunePerfection in a neon blue colour. At the bottom could you put Bringing Fantasy To Life same neon blue colour.
Thanks, RS PS

item.title: Client Background Request
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

Hey, Need a background for my client please, So if anyone could make me one I would be very very grateful.

Background: Could you just put pictures of pking and vengeance and inventories etc plz?
Text: At the top could you put RunePerfection in a neon blue colour.
At the bottom could you put Bringing Fantasy To Life same neon blue colour.

Thanks, RS PS
